MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: OCX to capture the screen, window or region.
English.Char_Desc_80: ActiveX Control to capture the screen, a window, or a region. FREEWARE.
English.Char_Desc_250: ActiveX control allowing you to capture an image of the screen, active window, or another window, or even capture a certain portion of the screen. You can also save the captured image to a Bitmap (BMP) file or send it to a picture control. FREEWARE.
English.Char_Desc_450: ActiveX control allowing you to capture an image of the screen, active window, or another window, or even capture a certain portion of the screen. You can also save the captured image to a Bitmap (BMP) file or send it to a picture control. FREEWARE.
English.Char_Desc_2000: ActiveX control allowing you to capture an image of the screen, active window, or another window, or even capture a certain portion of the screen. You can also save the captured image to a Bitmap (BMP) file or send it to a picture control. FREEWARE.
